author: samwilsn
content:
Spec Sync #7 
 - <@!497280885645639691> ethhash & block sync (on vacation this week)
 - <@!243183686562873344> put up the PR for state refactor 
 - <@!564718359304863744> contract creation and call opcode work

Decisions:
 - Optimised state implementation as monkey patched functions and not as a class.
 - Cancelling second spec sync this week (so the next one will be August 16, 10:30 AM ET [2:30 PM UTC])
